variable.name: AGE
variable.comment: Age at screening. Computed from Form 2 birth date. Age at screening may differ from the age stratum to which a participant was randomized, due to participants requesting a correction to their Form 2 birth date after randomization. Once a participant was randomized to a specific age stratum, they remained in that stratum despite corrections to their birth date. Therefore, the 'Age stratum at randomization or enrollment' variable may differ from the age reflected in this variable.

variable.name: AREA3Y
variable.description: Living in area for next 3 years
variable.comment: Do you think you will be living in this area for the next three years?

variable.name: OTHSTDY
variable.comment: Are you now in any other research study?

variable.name: EXSTDY
variable.comment: Is study on CC list of excluding studies? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q9 'In any other study'.

variable.name: BRCA_F2
variable.comment: Did a doctor ever say that you had breast cancer?

variable.name: COLON_F2
variable.comment: Did a doctor ever say that you had colon, rectum, bowel or intestinal cancer?

variable.name: COLON10Y
variable.comment: Were you told that you had this cancer in the last 10 years? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q11 'Cancer-colon,rectum'.

variable.name: ENDO_F2
variable.comment: Did a doctor ever say that you had endometrial cancer (cancer of the lining of the uterus or womb)?

variable.name: ENDO10Y
variable.comment: Were you told that you had this cancer in the last 10 years? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q12 'Cancer-endometrial'.

variable.name: SKIN_F2
variable.comment: Did a doctor ever say that you had skin cancer?

variable.name: MELAN_F2
variable.comment: Was the skin cancer a melanoma?

variable.name: MELAN10Y
variable.comment:
Were you told that you had this melanoma in the last 10 years? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q13 'Cancer-skin'.
Sub-question of F2 V3 Q13.1 'Cancer-melanoma'.

variable.name: OTHCA10Y
variable.description: Any other cancer than listed last 10 yrs
variable.comment: In the past 10 years, did a doctor ever say that you had any other cancers?

variable.name: RACE
variable.comment: How would you describe your racial or ethnic group? If you are of mixed blood, which group do you identify with most?

variable.name: HEARSTDY
variable.comment: How did you hear about the study? (Mark one. If you heard in more than one way, mark the one that made you decide to contact us.)

variable.name: HORM
variable.comment: Did you ever use any female hormones like estrogen (Premarin) or progesterone (Provera)?These might be pills, skin patches, implants, creams, suppositories, shots, or birth control pills. (This does not include birth control pills you used before you were 50.) Not collected on all versions of Form 2.

variable.name: HORMNW
variable.comment:
Are you using female hormones now? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q17 'Female hormones ever'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 2.

variable.name: HORM3M
variable.comment:
Have you used female hormones in the last 3 months? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q17 'Female hormones ever'.
Sub-question of F2 V3 Q17.1 'Female hormones now'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 2.

variable.name: OSTEOBK
variable.comment:
Have you ever had an osteoporosis-related fracture or broken bone? (Osteoporosis is a condition where bones become brittle and weak as a woman ages.) Sub-question of F2 V3 Q17 'Female hormones ever'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 2.

variable.name: HORMBK
variable.comment:
Did a doctor give you hormones to treat the fracture or broken bone? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q17 'Female hormones ever'.
Sub-question of F2 V3 Q17.3 'Osteoporosis-related fracture'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 2.

variable.name: HYST
variable.comment: Did you ever have a hysterectomy? (This is an operation to take out your uterus or womb.)

variable.name: HYST3M
variable.comment: Was your hysterectomy within the last 3 months? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q18 'Ever had a hysterectomy'.

variable.name: HYSTAGE
variable.comment: How old were you when you had your hysterectomy? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q18 'Ever had a hysterectomy'.

variable.name: MENSELST
variable.description: Last time had any menstrual bleeding
variable.comment: When was the last time you had any menstrual bleeding or spotting? (Your best guess.)

variable.name: MEALOUT
variable.description: 10 or more meals prepared away from home
variable.comment: How many of your meals are prepared away from your home each week, that is, meals that you eat in a restaurant, or as 'take-out', or at friends' or relatives' houses?

variable.name: MALDIET
variable.comment: Are you following a special diet prescribed by a doctor for malabsorption, celiac sprue (sometimes this is called a gluten-free diet), ulcerative colitis, or Crohn's disease? (We know that these may be unfamiliar words. If you have not been told to follow one of these diets, mark No.) Not collected on all versions of Form 2.

variable.name: LFDIETF2
variable.comment: Are you following a special low-fiber or low-residue diet (low in fruits, vegetables, and grains) that was prescribed for you by your doctor? Not collected on all versions of Form 2.

variable.name: DIAB
variable.comment: Did a doctor ever say that you had sugar diabetes or high blood sugar when you were not pregnant?

variable.name: DIABAGE
variable.comment: How old were you when you were first told you had sugar diabetes? (Don't include diabetes you had only when pregnant.) Sub-question of F2 V3 Q23 'Sugar diabetes'.

variable.name: DIABCOMA
variable.comment: Were you ever hospitalized for a diabetic coma? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q23 'Sugar diabetes'.

variable.name: DBDIETF2
variable.comment: Did a doctor ever tell you to keep a special diet for your diabetes? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q23 'Sugar diabetes'.

variable.name: INSULIN
variable.comment: Did you ever take insulin shots? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q23 'Sugar diabetes'.

variable.name: INSULINW
variable.comment:
Are you using insulin now? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q23 'Sugar diabetes'.
Sub-question of F2 V3 Q23.4 'Ever taken insulin'.

variable.name: DIABPILL
variable.comment: Did you ever take pills for your diabetes to lower your blood sugar? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q23 'Sugar diabetes'.

variable.name: DIABNW
variable.comment: Do you have sugar diabetes or high blood sugar now? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q23 'Sugar diabetes'.

variable.name: DVT
variable.comment: Did a doctor ever say that you had a blood clot in your legs? This is sometimes called deep vein thrombosis or DVT. This does not include varicose veins or phlebitis.

variable.name: DVT6M
variable.comment: Did you have a blood clot in your leg in the last 6 months? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q24 'Blood clot in legs'.

variable.name: DVTACC1M
variable.comment:
Did this blood clot occur within one month after a serious accident, fracture, injury, or operation? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q24 'Blood clot in legs'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 2.

variable.name: PE
variable.comment: Did a doctor ever say that you had a blood clot in your lung? This is sometimes called a pulmonary embolus or PE.

variable.name: PE6M
variable.comment: Did you have a blood clot in your lung in the last 6 months? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q25 'Blood clot in lung'.

variable.name: PEACC1M
variable.comment:
Did this blood clot occur within one month after a serious accident, fracture, injury, or operation? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q25 'Blood clot in lung'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 2.

variable.name: STROKE
variable.comment: Did a doctor ever say that you had a stroke?

variable.name: STROKE6M
variable.comment: Did you have a stroke in the last 6 months? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q26 'Stroke ever'.

variable.name: TIA
variable.comment: Did a doctor ever say that you had a small stroke that lasted less than 24 hours? This is sometimes called a transient ischemic attack or TIA.

variable.name: TIA6M
variable.comment: Did you have a TIA in the last 6 months? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q27 'Small stroke ever'.

variable.name: MI
variable.comment: Did a doctor ever say that you had a heart attack? This is sometimes called a coronary, myocardial infarction, or MI.

variable.name: MIAGE
variable.comment: How old were you when you had your first heart attack? (Your best guess.) Sub-question of F2 V3 Q28 'Heart attack ever'.

variable.name: MI6M
variable.comment: Did you have a heart attack in the last 6 months? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q28 'Heart attack ever'.

variable.name: SCANEMIA
variable.comment: Did a doctor ever say that you had any of the following health problems? (Please mark No or Yes for each problem listed.) Sickle cell anemia?

variable.name: CHF_F2
variable.comment: Did a doctor ever say that you had any of the following health problems? (Please mark No or Yes for each problem listed.) Heart failure?

variable.name: LIVERDIS
variable.comment: Did a doctor ever say that you had any of the following health problems? (Please mark No or Yes for each problem listed.) Liver disease (chronic active hepatitis, cirrhosis, or yellow jaundice)?

variable.name: BLDPROB
variable.comment: Did a doctor ever say that you had any of the following health problems? (Please mark No or Yes for each problem listed.) Bleeding problem?

variable.name: L15LBS6M
variable.description: Lost 15 lbs in the last 6 mo w/o trying
variable.comment: Have you lost 15 or more pounds in the last 6 months without trying?

variable.name: DIALYSIS
variable.comment: Are you on kidney dialysis or a kidney machine for kidney or renal failure?

variable.name: OTHCHRON
variable.comment: Do you have any other long-term or chronic illness?

variable.name: HARDSTDY
variable.description: Problems make it hard to participate
variable.comment: Are there any reasons, like serious emotional problems, mental illness, or too much stress, that would make it hard for you to be in a research study? Not collected on all versions of Form 2.

variable.name: COMECC
variable.comment: Will you be able to come to our clinic?

variable.name: HELPCC
variable.description: Kind of help needed to come to clinic
variable.comment: What kind of help would you need to come to our clinic? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q34 'Able to get to clinic'.

variable.name: INTDM
variable.description: Interested in DM part of study
variable.comment: Do you think you might be interested in the Dietary Change part of the study?

variable.name: AVAILDM
variable.comment:
If you join the dietary part of the study, you will be placed in a dietary change or usual diet group. You may be attending regular group meetings. Will you be available for regular meetings for the next year? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q35 'Interested in diet'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 2.

variable.name: INTHRT
variable.description: Interested in HRT part of study
variable.comment: Do you think you might be interested in the Hormone Replacement part of the study?

variable.name: AVAILHRT
variable.description: Consider taking only HRT from CC
variable.comment:
If you join the hormone part of the study, you may be placed into the hormone or no-hormone (placebo) group. Would you consider taking only the hormone pills given to you by Clinical Center staff if you join the hormone part of the study? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q36 'Interested in HRT'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 2.

variable.name: TALKDOC
variable.description: Interested in talking to Dr. about HRT
variable.comment:
If you are currently on hormones, are you interested in talking to your doctor about the Hormone Replacement part of the study? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q36 'Interested in HRT'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 2.

variable.name: HRTINFDR
variable.comment:
Would you like us to send information about the Hormone Replacement part of the study to your doctor? Sub-question of F2 V3 Q36 'Interested in HRT'.
Not collected on all versions of Form 2.

variable.name: HELPFILL
variable.description: Need someone to help fill out forms
variable.comment: Will you need someone to help you fill out forms if you join this study? Not collected on all versions of Form 2.

variable.name: AGER
variable.comment: Computed from Form 2 birth date. Age categorized into three 10-year intervals (<50-59, 60-69 and 70-79+). Categorization of this variable may differ from the 'Age stratum at randomization or enrollment' variable due to participants requesting a correction to their Form 2 birth date after randomization/enrollment.

variable.name: HORMSTAT
variable.comment: Computed from Form 2, questions 17 and 17.1. Combines questions 17 and 17.1 into a three category HRT use variable (never, past, current).

variable.name: AGEHYST
variable.comment: Computed from Form 2, questions 18 and 18.2. Collapses age at hysterectomy categories from question 18.2 into four groups. Set to missing if no hysterectomy, or age at hysterectomy is missing.

variable.name: DIABTRT
variable.comment: Computed from Form 2, question 23, 23.4 and 23.6. Indicator for whether the participant has ever been treated for diabetes with pills or shots.
